Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A group of ten male and female performers make up the chamber music orchestra, a group of musicians finely dressed in velvet of a midnight blue color accented by silver silk. There are four violinists, their finely-crafted string instruments stained in dark tones of rich mahogany. Off to the right of them is a man with a large drum, his drum sticks sanded to a smooth golden finish. Seated along the front of the group is a group of three flautists with richly-stained instruments held at the ready. Standing before the ensemble is a thin, willowy man with a maestro's baton.
A group of ten performers make up the chamber music orchestra, a group of musicians finely-dressed in midnight blue and silver. There are four violinists, three flautists, a drummer and the maestro.

A large man stands to the right of the group with a drum hanging before him from a dark midnight blue velvet strap that matches the outfit he wears. An accent of silver silk ruffles decorate his wrists, flouncing as he strikes the drum with the pale golden stained drumsticks he holds.

The flautists are seated at the fore of the orchestra ensemble, dressed in matching outfits comprised of midnight blue velvet and silver silk. They are holding thin flutes carved from a dark stained mahogany wood.

The maestro of the orchestra is a thin, willowy man dressed in a velvet midnight blue coat with long coat tails. The sleeves are accented by silver silk ruffles that flounce when he swishes his thin baton to conduct the chamber music orchestra.

The four violinists stand at the back of the orchestral ensemble, their violins and bow strings held at the ready. They are dressed in matching outfits of midnight blue velvet and silver silk, giving them a cohesive appearance as they stand with their finely crafted dark mahogany violins.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ The maestro turns to the ensemble and holds his baton aloft. The musicians lift their instruments into position as the maestro begins conducting and the introductory notes of the musical number fill the space. \| The group of musicians slide into an upbeat number in three-quarter time, the rise and fall of the string instruments' melody filling the room with an melody suited for the waltz. \| The rousing waltz echoes through the hall, the musicians swaying rhythmically in unison as they draw their bows over the strings of their instruments. The dancers rise and fall in time to the lilting notes of the song. \| The musicians and their instruments fill the hall with an upbeat melody, accented by the swirling skirts and waltzing couples that fill the area. The notes of the music build to a fortissimo before waning once more. \| The musicians begin a delicate ensemble of light and airy string music accented by the delicate harmony of the flutes. This moderate tempo number matches the dainty, measured steps of a minuet. \| The short, sweet notes of the wind instruments are laced together by the upbeat tones of the string instruments. The dancers on the floor circle and turn with their partners through the delicate steps. \| The bright and cheerful sounds of the music fill the hall with a delicate, lilting melody. Dancers turn and swirl in accompaniment to the rhythms with dainty steps and sweeping turns. \| The ensemble begins with a percussive processional rhythm on a small drum. The other musicians take up the melody with a somber ceremonial tune that marks the beginning of the volte. \| The musicians continue the moderately-paced tempo as the dancers circle one another in time to the music, leaping from the ground with the upbeat of the song. \| The strong tones of the music fill the hall as some of the dancers step closer into an intimate hold, turning in time to the music. The triumphant crescendo of the song is accented by a handful of the dancers as they lift their partners into the air in time to the music. \| The last notes of the song are drawn out as the musicians wind down to the conclusion of the melody. At last they lower their instruments for an intermission. \| A few of the masked dancers lingering in the periphery of the room break into merry laughter, their glasses lightly clinking together as they toast. \| The masked dancers drift away from the dance floor, mingling around the area in small groups as the women murmur in hushed tones to one another behind their embroidered silk fans. \| The masked dancers lightly applaud the musical number before wandering away from the dance floor to seek refreshment and conversation among their friends. \}

X[S] \{ The maestro turns to the ensemble and holds his baton aloft. The musicians lift their instruments into position as the maestro begins conducting and the introductory notes of the musical number fill the space. \| The group of musicians slide into an upbeat number in three-quarter time, the rise and fall of the string instruments' melody filling the room with an melody suited for the waltz. \| The rousing waltz echoes through the hall, the musicians swaying rhythmically in unison as they draw their bows over the strings of their instruments. The dancers rise and fall in time to the lilting notes of the song. \| The musicians and their instruments fill the hall with an upbeat melody, accented by the swirling skirts and waltzing couples that fill the area. The notes of the music build to a fortissimo before waning once more. \| The musicians begin a delicate ensemble of light and airy string music accented by the delicate harmony of the flutes. This moderate tempo number matches the dainty, measured steps of a minuet. \| The short, sweet notes of the wind instruments are laced together by the upbeat tones of the string instruments. The dancers on the floor circle and turn with their partners through the delicate steps. \| The bright and cheerful sounds of the music fill the hall with a delicate, lilting melody. Dancers turn and swirl in accompaniment to the rhythms with dainty steps and sweeping turns. \| The ensemble begins with a percussive processional rhythm on a small drum. The other musicians take up the melody with a somber ceremonial tune that marks the beginning of the volte. \| The musicians continue the moderately-paced tempo as the dancers circle one another in time to the music, leaping from the ground with the upbeat of the song. \| The strong tones of the music fill the hall as some of the dancers step closer into an intimate hold, turning in time to the music. The triumphant crescendo of the song is accented by a handful of the dancers as they lift their partners into the air in time to the music. \| The last notes of the song are drawn out as the musicians wind down to the conclusion of the melody. At last they lower their instruments for an intermission. \| A few of the masked dancers lingering in the periphery of the room break into merry laughter, their glasses lightly clinking together as they toast. \| The masked dancers drift away from the dance floor, mingling around the area in small groups as the women murmur in hushed tones to one another behind their embroidered silk fans. \| The masked dancers lightly applaud the musical number before wandering away from the dance floor to seek refreshment and conversation among their friends. \}
X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "You cannot take " + Describe(\$this)+ " because it is not yours."); return FALSE;
